title: My rank disappeared?
body: Okay so logged in today and I noticed that my account says I'm in placements.  Even though I already have a rank. Can someone explain? I can't play any ranked games because I don't want to register as placement games when I'm not supposed to be in placements. It has also deleted all my ranked stats. Someone please help.

replies.body: This is a visual display issue while we undergo maintenance.  Updates will be posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Your profile will return to normal after it's over.  Fear not, you won't have to place again!

This is likely due to Riot disabling the Leagues (ranked) system since they are currently performing maintenance. For now, you will be unable to view your rank or ranked stats. I'm guessing this will be fixed once the maintenance is done.
